thread.title: The 112-track Bob’s Burgers album will be out in May
thread.title_full: The 112-track Bob’s Burgers album will be out in May - The Verge

author: Lizzie Plaugic
title: The 112-track Bob’s Burgers album will be out in May
text:
We’ve been waiting on more news about the Bob’s Burgers album since 2014 , and now it finally has a release date: May 12th. As Pitchfork points out , the 112-track album will be released by Sub Pop, and will feature original tracks from cast members and covers by musicians.
St. Vincent, The National, and the Magnetic Fields’ Stephin Merritt will appear on the LP, alongside tracks from people like H. Jon Benjamin, Fred Armisen, Eugene Mirman, and Kristen Schaal.
In case you missed it two paragraphs ago, that’s 112 tracks of music from the Fox television show Bob’s Burgers . Sure, a bunch of them are under a minute long, but it should be enough to tide you over until season 8.
